creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: blue shoe body with blue side lining; upturned toe and lined floral heel flaps; front and sides embroidered in satn stitch in pinks, red, green, beige, black; bound opening edges; light reinforced sole (paper) with heavy cord stitching throughout
title: Pair of Shoes
